archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.1.10b: b) storing source code (or equivalent) in a secure location away from the live environment and restricting access to this code to a limited number of authorised individuals
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
